org.apache.poi.util

Class XMLHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.util.XMLHelper

  • @Internal
public final class XMLHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper methods for working with javax.xml classes.
    See Also:
    OWASP XXE
